summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing construction of Contract No. 2 (Melrose Avenue) of the Lake Union - South - Unit \#1 Sewer Separation Project to separate existing combined sewers in the area generally bounded by East Denny Way on the north, 17th Avenue East on the east, East Union Street on the south, and Melrose Avenue East on the west, and making an appropriation from the Sewer Improvement Fund therefor.
